1.caption_en:
Slide introducing the "Platform Value Network" tool to map stakeholder groups (Consumers, Producers, Partners, Owners), their value propositions, transactions and the platform's core value and mission.

{
  "title": "Platform Value Network",
  "type": "slide / tool overview",
  "version": "v5.0",
  "purpose": "Help users conceptualize interactions between key platform stakeholders and map value propositions, transactions, and money flow.",
  "key_questions": [
    "Why should they join?",
    "What are inbound and outbound transactions?",
    "How is the flow of the money?"
  ],
  "tasks": [
    "Identify the key stakeholders in the consumer, producer, partner and owner groups.",
    "Identify the key needs and value propositions for the stakeholders involved.",
    "Derive the core value of the platform.",
    "Identify key transactions between the stakeholders of the platform."
  ],
  "diagram": {
    "type": "circular quadrant diagram",
    "quadrants": ["Consumers", "Producers", "Partners", "Owners"],
    "inner_layers": ["Core Value", "Mission"],
    "sections": ["Value Propositions", "Transactions"],
    "visual_elements": {
      "numbered_markers": ["1","2","3","4"],
      "colored_arcs": ["green","yellow","orange","blue"],
      "icons": ["group icon (consumers)","factory icon (producers)","link icon (partners)","people icon (owners)"]
    }
  },
  "layout": "left column with title, description and numbered steps; right side large diagram with footer containing 'PLATFORM VALUE NETWORK v5.0' and logos",
  "language": "English",
  "detected_text_snippet": "Selected Tools from the Process “Platform Value Network” Helps you to conceptualize the interaction between the key stakeholders of your platform."
}

3.caption_en: A schematic and worksheet titled "Platform Value Network" that helps teams map key stakeholders (consumers, producers, partners, owners), their value propositions and transactions, and derive the platform’s core value and mission.
3.caption_ru: A schematic and worksheet titled "Platform Value Network" that helps teams map key stakeholders (consumers, producers, partners, owners), their value propositions and transactions, and derive the platform’s core value and mission.
